trans.tran_cn: 习语，成语，方言，土语，（语言）风格，惯用语法
trans.tran_en: a group of words that has a special meaning that is different from the ordinary meaning of each separate word. For example, ‘under the weather’ is an idiom meaning ‘ill’.
